  1. from django.db import models
  2. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  3. from cms.models import CMSPlugin
  4. from cms.utils.helpers import reversion_register
  7. # Stores the actual data
  8. class Snippet(models.Model):
  9. """
  10. A snippet of HTML or a Django template
  11. """
  12. name = models.CharField(_("name"), max_length=255, unique=True)
  13. html = models.TextField(_("HTML"), blank=True)
  14. template = models.CharField(_("template"), max_length=50, blank=True, \
  15. help_text=_('Enter a template (i.e. "snippets/plugin_xy.html") which will be rendered. ' + \
  16. 'If "template" is given, the contents of field "HTML" will be passed as template variable {{ html }} to the template. ' + \
  17. 'Else, the content of "HTML" is rendered.'))
  19. def __unicode__(self):
  20. return self.name
  22. class Meta:
  23. ordering = ['name']
  24. verbose_name = _("Snippet")
  25. verbose_name_plural = _("Snippets")
  27. # Plugin model - just a pointer to Snippet
  28. class SnippetPtr(CMSPlugin):
  29. snippet = models.ForeignKey(Snippet)
  31. class Meta:
  32. verbose_name = _("Snippet")
  34. search_fields = ('snippet__html',)
  36. def __unicode__(self):
  37. # Return the referenced snippet's name rather than the default (ID #)
  38. return self.snippet.name
  41. # We don't both with SnippetPtr, since all the data is actually in Snippet
  42. reversion_register(Snippet)
